ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_nrgring | |- ( R e. NrmRing -> R e. Ring ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_subrgid | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( Base ` R ) e. ( SubRing ` R ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_syl | |- ( R e. NrmRing -> ( Base ` R ) e. ( SubRing ` R ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_rlmval | |- ( ringLMod ` R ) = ( ( subringAlg ` R ) ` ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_sranlm | |- ( ( R e. NrmRing /\ ( Base ` R ) e. ( SubRing ` R ) ) -> ( ringLMod ` R ) e. NrmMod ) |
| 7 | 4, 6 | #P_mpdan | |- ( R e. NrmRing -> ( ringLMod ` R ) e. NrmMod ) |
